changeSet.author: dms
changeSet.comment: Update admin password to correct hash for admin123 - Run PasswordHashGenerator to generate correct hash if needed
changeSet.sql: -- Update admin password hash for 'admin123' if admin user exists -- Note: This hash should be generated using: PasswordHashGenerator.main(new String[]{"admin123"}) -- Current hash may need to be updated if login fails UPDATE users SET password = '$2a$10$N9qo8uLOickgx2ZMRZoMyeIjZAgcfl7p92ldGxad68LJZdL17lhWy' WHERE username = 'admin' AND password != '$2a$10$N9qo8uLOickgx2ZMRZoMyeIjZAgcfl7p92ldGxad68LJZdL17lhWy';
